page.title: 09LEISURE TIME OUT OF SCHOOL
page.content:
Kids today find anything to do. They play out in the street, they go swimming. They go to Kung Foo, but its all to do with money. They go to the library to pass the time. They go to Teddington Park. They even write on the buses and the lamp posts. A gang play all different sports. They even count the ants to pass the time. They go on their roller boots and they still say they are bored. You see a lot of horses in Teddington. Thats how people spend their spare time.
STANLEY SCHOOL
